AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.issues_are_not_addressed: Did not properly identify and address issue(s) before the Board
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.findings_are_not_supported: Findings are not supported by adequate reasons, bases
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.process_violations: Did not adequately address due process violations
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.remands_are_not_completed: Remands not complete, legally sufficient or require necessary development
AREAS_FOR_IMPROVEMENT.grammar_errors: Major or frequent spelling, grammar, typographical, usage, formatting errors
